Ok, what you need for that error is to get you latest video card drivers. That's what worked for me

For anyone who sees the intro then it shuts down:  you need a new graphics card that has pixel shader 2.0  current cards have 3.0 so that covers just about everything on the market.

People who cannot update to 1.3:  The paradox server that lets you upload the patch is overloaded.  You need to find the patch somewhere else.  I know this sounds unlikely, but it is really that simple.  It is a networking problem on their end.

This works fine. When you first open the game, there will be a screen that asks if you want to check for an update. Get the update, and run BEFORE you try to play the game. Trying to play without the patch is going to give you errors.

Other then that, there's nothing you need to run this game. Decent upload
